meta_description: Welcome to the website of Eduardo Villada Gallardo, Fullstack Developer. Explore his resume, project portfolio, and articles on programming and technology.
welcome-text-1: This page started as a test to study how Laravel works, and, as I am currently looking for a job, I thought there is nothing better to do than this... Well, in the end it has turned into a React project!
welcome-text-2: It is currently under development, but in the future I hope it will be functional and useful for everyone! After all, I would like to share on this website all the knowledge I acquire as I work on different projects.
welcome-text-3: By the way, I am a lover of two wheels, so you will see a lot of content related to the trips I make, such as routes or even their telemetry. I am still thinking about how to include it.
